segments.text: I'm Mary Kell . May I ask your name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My name is Zhuang Lingy . How are you , Miss Kelly ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm glad to meet you , Mr . Zhuang . Sit down , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are your qualifications for being a clerk typist ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can type 120 words a minute and I take shorthand at 80 words a minute .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you be willing to take a typing and shorthand test ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your typing and stenography are pretty good . Would you be interested in applying for the job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to give it a try .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . You need to have an interview with our manager , Mr . McBride . Let â€™ s go to his office .
segments.speaker: S1
